title: The only M3 MacBook Air we recommend for everyone is nearly $300 off
content:
Macworld

Easily one of the best laptops you can get, the MacBook Air is almost always on sale. But that’s usually for the base model—for Black Friday you can get the maxed-out model for $1,424 at Amazon, a savings of $275 and the best price we’ve ever seen. This M3 MacBook Air model has 24GB of RAM and 512GB storage—the very best MacBook Air you can spend money on at this time. This deal is a great price for a fantastic machine that will perform as well as some higher-priced MacBook Pro models.

The laptop features a 15.4-inch Liquid Retina Display that’s absolutely gorgeous. No matter if you’re just streaming Netflix or you’re working on a report you have to hand in, the laptop will do its job wonderfully. When you want to leave the house, the laptop’s 18-hour battery life will make you less prone to panic that you’ll end up with the device shutting down on you before you finish the day. Plus, the laptop itself is less than an inch thick and just 3.3 pounds heavy, so carrying it won’t be an issue.

We reviewed this MacBook and gave it a near-perfect score, without expert praising its performance, excellent battery life, and a great combination of price, features, and performance. “Simply the best, but better,” we wrote.

So go ahead and take advantage of this tremendous Black Friday discount for the M3 MacBook Air before the limited-time Black Friday sale is gone forever.
